column2: Verify Product listing page loads correctly
column3: 1. Open homepage. 2. Verify that Product are listed.
column4: Product should be listed with name, image, price, and type.
column5: Product are correctly listed with all required details.

column3: 1. Enter Product name in the search bar. 2. Verify results display matching Product.
column4: Search results should show Product that match the query.
column5: Search results match the query and show the relevant Product.

column2: Verify Product detail page loads correctly
column3: 1. Click on a Product from the listing. 2. Verify the individual Product details page loads.
column4: Product details page should display Product name, image, specifications, and  price.
column5: Product details page loads with all required information.

column3: 1. Open homepage. 2. Measure the load time using Lighthouse.
column4: The homepage should load within 2 seconds.

column3: 1. Open the homepage in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. 2. Verify that the page renders correctly on all browsers.
column4: Page should render consistently across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
column5: Page renders correctly on all tested browsers.

column2: Verify responsive design on mobile devices
column3: 1. Open the homepage on mobile devices using BrowserStack. 2. Verify the layout is responsive.
column4: Layout should adjust properly on all mobile devices.
column5: Layout adjusts properly and is responsive on mobile devices.

column2: Verify API security for Ecomerce data
column3: 1. Make a test API call to fetch Product details. 2. Ensure API is accessed over HTTPS.
column4: API should be accessed over HTTPS and secure.
column5: API communication is secure and uses HTTPS.
